2025 Summer Membership Rates
Golf
For Five Months
May,June, July, August, September
Membership Rates
Single $400 (+ tax) $424
Couple $500 (+ tax) $530.00
Junior (17 & under) $200 (+ tax) $212
Cart & Lease Fees Are Not Included
Monthly Trail Fees Single $79 (+ tax) $83.74 or Couple Trail Fees $118 (+ tax) $125.08
Monthly Cart Fees Single $162 (+ tax) $171.72 or Monthly Couple $216 (+ tax) $228.96
Cart Fees for Individual Round $18.00
Download the Application

Membership Information
Membership in the Country Club shall be open to persons of good, moral character who are interested in golf, swimming, tennis and social activities for the benefit of the members and the community. Membership is available without regard to race, color, sex or national origin.
Family
Golf
— Full club privileges for the married member, spouse and children under the age of 21.
Associate Golf
— Full Family club privileges for members ages 21—49 and their spouse and children under the age of 21.
Weekend Golf
— Provides use of golf course on
weekends and national holidays for a married member, spouse and children under age 21 years with payment of cart fees. Restaurant and lounge may be used any time, but pool and tennis courts are not included. No minimums, no initiation fee, or stock purchase required.
There is also a 6-month minimum for weekend
memberships.
Social
— Club privileges include use of the clubhouse, tennis courts and swimming pool for a member, spouse and children under 21.
Single
Golf
— Full club privileges for an individual.
Associate Golf
— Full club privileges for an individual age 21—49.
Weekend Golf
— Provides use of golf course on weekends and national holidays for an individual with payment of cart fees. Restaurant and lounge may be used
any time, but pool and tennis courts are not included. No minimums, no initiation fee, or stock purchase required. There is also a 6-month minimum for weekend memberships.
Social
— Club privileges include use of the clubhouse, tennis courts and swimming pool for an individual. You may play golf for the normal Green & Cart fees.
Non Resident
Family Golf
— Full club privileges for the married member, spouse and children under the age of 21 whose primary resident is outside of Citrus County, a minimum commitment of one (1) month is required.
Single Golf
— Full club privileges for an individual. whose primary resident is outside of Citrus County, a minimum commitment of one (1) month is required.
Family Social
—Club privileges include use of the clubhouse, tennis courts and swimming pool for a member, spouse and children under 21. You may play golf for the normal Green & Cart fees.
Single Social
— Club privileges include use of the clubhouse, tennis courts and swimming pool for an individual. You may play golf for the normal Green & Cart fees.
Junior
Golf
— Full club privileges to a person up to age 21 if family is not a member of IGCC.
Corporate
Golf
— Full club privileges for four (4) members and spouses who are full-time officers and/or senior management.
Social
— Club privileges include use of the clubhouse, tennis courts and swimming pool for four (4) members and spouses who are full-time officers and/or senior management. You may play golf for the normal Green & Cart fees.
Membership Dues & Fees
